title: Poll: Get rid of the tables on Garen's shoulders
body:
Why cant we get Garen to look more like this below: 

https://cdnb.artstation.com/p/assets/images/images/000/031/033/large/garen_render.jpg?1400199446

No,  instead we get this table shoulder abomination:

https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/6/6d/Garen_OriginalSkin.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170621202244 


Why RIOT? This guy used to look normal when he had reasonable body anatomy. 



https://uploads.disquscdn.com/images/5477f8f0cb35ff266a4def1e14352be7ca7ec772e6416ddfdfee4177a95bb0e1.jpg




Edit: Cmon guys, we gotta make Riot delete the tables!!
